Articles.Content:
It seem since 0.90 if I have KSP open or have closed it out, Google Chrome's tab system stops working. I've narrowed it down to the KSP.exe

Edit:

KSP: 0.90.0 x64 version

Google Chrome: Version 39.0.2171.95 m

OS: Windows 7 64bit

Edited December 19, 2014 by deepfield

It seem since 0.90 if I have KSP open or have closed it out, Google Chrome's tab system stops working. I've narrowed it down to the KSP.exe

Edit:

KSP: 0.90.0 x64 version

Google Chrome: Version 39.0.2171.95 m

OS: Windows 7 64bit

This is a known issue w/64bit version of KSP.

If you right-click your tab/top bar of the browser you should get control back.
